Review_Text: The biggest threat to the US is EMP and it could be solved, completely for less than $50 billion. This kind of of money is easily available from federal, state, and private parties.This great documentary outlines the problems and solutions very clearly.Dennis Quaid is great as a serious documentarian and the sources cited are rock solid. If you don't understand how electric grids work and how they are vulnerable, you will in short time while watching this.It's a bipartisan problem and the solution is bipartisan. This documentary is nonpartisan and and lays out the problems clearly. Too important to ignore.
